title: 'Computer Arts' body text font
content:
Hi all,  
Ashamed to say I can't place this one. Ignore the fact that the text is nonsense: I joined together a bunch of characters to feed through WhatTheFont; but it couldn't identify this correctly. Of course, some of you may just know what font _Computer Arts_ uses without needing the image, but...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20111229144734im_/http:/typophile.com/files/CA_font_4894.jpg)
author: dtw

comments.content:
Ah, cheers guys. I'm sure I was looking at the Lineto site not long ago, too.  
\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_  
Ever since I chose to block pop-ups, my toaster's stopped working.
